title: Ep 13: Advice + Hello From Asia (And Why We are the Worst/Best Trip Planners?)
itunes:title: Ep 13: Advice + Hello From Asia (And Why we are the Worst but Maybe Best Trip Planners?)
description:
In today's advice episode, we answer a mix of your questions. How to network without being thaaat person, beating procrastination, and each of our approaches to shopping. 

We also discuss why we are the WORST trip planners ever (let's just say we planned this trip very last minute!), our obsessions (@heidiwynne + @megababe) and everything we're reading right now.

 

Join us on June 27 for our first adult book pick: Social Creature by Tara Isabella Barton.

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
